body.p: Gentoo Linux 1.1a has been released; improvements include important pam/shadow/util-linux security fixes, new KDE3 ebuilds, many important improvements to Portage, new NVIDIA drivers and seamless OpenGL configuration, and more. Of course, existing Gentoo Linux users can upgrade in-place by following the instructions included in our email release announcement. New users can find install instructions here and ISOs and build tarballs here (and on our mirrors soon). Also be sure to read our new Portage Manual to get up to speed with the new Gentoo Linux 1.0+ features.
